data.prayer: Lord, please give apostles to expand the church into every neighborhood of Suceava, Romania.
data.verse: Therefore go and make disciples of all nations, baptizing them in the name of the Father and of the Son and of the Holy Spirit, and teaching them to obey everything I have commanded you.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Suceava, Romania
data.section_summary: What challenges do people here face?

data.prayer: Father, encourage the 39,408 believers in Suceava to not just be consumers of knowledge but be producers of love, mercy, kindness, and justice.
data.verse: let us not love with words or speech but with actions and in truth.

data.section_summary: On average, 53 babies will be born in the next 100 hours to families who might know about God culturally, but likely have no relationship with Jesus in Suceava, Romania.
data.prayer: Father, reveal yourself to these new families.
Father, please raise up prophets in Suceava who can call the church to holiness and purity, preparing your church as a bride for your Son.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up

data.prayer: Father, we pray that the people of Suceava, Romania will learn to study the Bible, understand it, obey it, and share it.
Jesus, I pray that all the Tatar, Crimean people will remember and turn to you, Lord God. May all the Tatar, Crimean people worship before you. For the kingdom of the Tatar, Crimean people is yours.
Father, send out evangelists who will challenge people like Peter who said, "Repent and be baptized, every one of you" in the state of Suceava, Romania.
data.verse: Peter replied, “Repent and be baptized, every one of you, in the name of Jesus Christ for the forgiveness of your sins. And you will receive the gift of the Holy Spirit.

data.prayer: Father, multiply brothers, sisters, and mothers to our spiritual family in Suceava, Romania.
data.verse: He replied to him, “Who is my mother, and who are my brothers?” Pointing to his disciples, he said, “Here are my mother and my brothers. For whoever does the will of my Father in heaven is my brother and sister and mother.”

data.section_summary:
the state of Suceava, Romania has a population of 622,600.

We estimate Suceava has 39,408 people who might know Jesus, 543,692 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 39,499 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 15 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Jesus, please help the 39,408 believers in the state of Suceava to be filled with joyful obedience at all times, as you modeled for us all.
